Freighter

A Freighter data type consists of four components. Freighter needs to be compiled along with oen of the 2 features i.e iota_api or pipe_api

Components

client: An instance of selected feature current_idx: Current Index of the Cursor seed: A secret key of an bytes length, equivalent to a private key, keep secret!  node_address: IP address of the Node to be used with Freighter

Functions
new

Creates a new Freighter instance

Parameters
node_address

IP address of the Node to be used with Freighter

seed

A secret key of an bytes length, equivalent to a private key, keep secret!

Returns

A new Freighter instance

Example
// Can be BIP 39 Mnemonic, a keyfile, etc. As long as it's origin is secure and the user is made aware it's private info!
let seed = "r4uujahLuOtzxLn4TTwwwtF3eDmftGdQ".as_bytes();
let node = String::from("http://127.0.0.1:123456");
let mut freighter = Freighter::new(node, seed);

See Function init

init

Initializes a newly created Freighter instance

Example
// Can be BIP 39 Mnemonic, a keyfile, etc. As long as it's origin is secure and the user is made aware it's private info!
let seed = "r4uujahLuOtzxLn4TTwwwtF3eDmftGdQ".as_bytes();
let node = String::from("http://127.0.0.1:123456");
let mut freighter = Freighter::new(node, seed);
freighter.init().await;
forward

Searches forward for messages in a Freighter Channel

Parameters
channel_history_manager

Instance of Cursor

Returns

A Vec<Vec<u8>> of freighter messages

Example
// Initialize a freighter instance first.
let mut history_manager = Cursor::new(5);
let messages = freighter.forward(&mut history_manager).await;
See Also

See Function init

Searches backwards for messages in a Freighter Channel

Parameters
channel_history_manager

Instance of Cursor

Returns

A Vec<Vec<u8>> of freighter messages

Example
// Initialize a freighter instance first.
let mut history_manager = Cursor::new(5);
let messages = freighter.forward(&mut history_manager).await;

send_message

Sends message over a Freighter channel

Parameters
message

reference to contents of message as bytes

Returns

A Vec<u8> of transaction hash

Example
// Initialize a freighter instance first.
let data = "Test message";
let trx_id = freighter.send_message(data.to_string().as_bytes()).await.unwrap();
See Also

See Function init
